### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] disk error on stor-a-02: read errors detected
- [WARNING] high node utilization on node 70: 98.6%
- [INFO] compaction pending reduced to 90
- [INFO] quota hard blocks: 3
- [INFO] quota soft limit hits: 24

### Deployments & Changes
- Rebalance jobs: 12 started and completed; moved 406 TB at 1040 Mbps; queue depth 4; skew index 1.08
- Quota digest email and dashboard rollout completed
- Removed temporary write sheds after headroom recovery confirmation

### Events
- Completed 12 rebalance jobs and reduced hottest-node utilization to 98.6%; removed temporary write sheds after confirming headroom recovery
- One disk began accumulating read errors on stor-a-02; pre-failed disk and scheduled replacement with shard drain to avoid rebuild at peak
- Compaction pending reduced from 104 to 90 after prioritizing tombstone-heavy keyspaces; scrub errors decreased accordingly
- Rolled out quota digest email and dashboard; quota hard blocks dropped from 4 to 3

### On-Call
- Shift: Mei H. 4 pages. 8 tickets. Status: Stable but tight; rebalance effective, pending disk replacement planned, continuing quota governance and compaction prioritization
